info.title: SWP391 Drug Prevention API
info.description:
Clean API documentation for SWP391 Drug Prevention Platform - Only active endpoints

**ðŸ”“ DEVELOPMENT TESTING:**
To test protected endpoints without authentication, add the header:
`x-swagger-bypass: true`

This will bypass token verification and use a mock admin user for testing purposes.

question.example: How confident are you in your knowledge?

deleted.description: Whether the question is soft deleted

questions_json.description: Survey questions (only non-deleted questions are returned)

answer_json.description: JSON string containing the response data

bearerAuth.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: 'Bearer {token}'

swaggerBypass.name: x-swagger-bypass
swaggerBypass.description: ðŸ”“ Development bypass for authentication (set to 'true' to skip token verification)

survey_id.description: ID of the survey being responded to

answer.description: Answer value (string for single choice, array for multiple choice)

oneOf.description: Array of days of the week

daysofweek.description: Day(s) of the week to update

slot.description: Array of slot IDs to assign

400.description: Invalid input or slot IDs do not exist

get.summary: Get detailed dashboard statistics for admin

get.description: Debug endpoint to retrieve all users including passwords - no authentication required. WARNING: This endpoint exposes sensitive data and should only be used for debugging.

message.example: Users retrieved successfully (DEBUG MODE - includes passwords)

get.description: This endpoint tests if the Swagger bypass is working. Add header 'x-swagger-bypass: true' to test without authentication.

401.description: Unauthorized - Token required (unless bypass header is used)

hint.example: For Swagger testing, add header 'x-swagger-bypass: true'

get.summary: Get consultant ID for authenticated user

404.description: Consultant not found for this user

parameters.name: bookingId
parameters.description: ID of the booking session to update

google_meet_link.description: Google Meet link for the session (optional)

400.description: Invalid input data (consultant not found, slot not found, invalid date format, invalid status)

get.summary: Get assessment details for specific user
Get programs with user's enrollment status
Check if user is enrolled in program
Get all surveys by program ID
get.description: Retrieve all surveys for a specific program. Only non-deleted questions are returned.

message.example: All surveys for program ID 1 retrieved successfully

get.summary: Get surveys by program ID and type
get.description: Retrieve surveys for a specific program and type. Only non-deleted questions are returned.

data.description: Array containing only the first survey (enforces 1 per type/program)

message.example: Survey of type 'pre-assessment' for program ID 1 retrieved successfully

404.description: No survey found for the specified program and type

message.example: No survey of type 'pre-assessment' found for program ID 1

get.description: Retrieve all survey responses for the authenticated user in key-value format.

get.summary: Check if current user has responded to a survey
get.description: Check if the authenticated user has already submitted a response for a specific survey.

message.example: You have already responded to this survey

get.summary: Get survey response statistics by program ID and type
get.description: Get comprehensive statistics for survey responses, including answer counts and percentages. Only processes statistics for non-deleted questions.

404.description: No surveys found for the specified program

message.example: No surveys found for the specified program

get.summary: Get survey responses by date range
get.description: Retrieve survey responses within a specified date range (Admin/Staff only).

get.summary: Get parsed survey response by ID
get.description: Retrieve a specific survey response with parsed answer data (Admin/Staff only).

get.summary: Get survey response with user and survey info
get.description: Retrieve a survey response with related user and survey information (Admin/Staff only).

200.description: Survey response with relations retrieved successfully

message.example: Survey response with relations retrieved successfully

get.description: Retrieve all responses for a specific survey (Admin/Staff only).
Retrieve all responses for a specific user (Admin/Staff only).
Get detailed analytics for a specific survey, including response patterns and statistics. Only processes analytics for non-deleted questions.

get.summary: Check if specific user has responded to a survey
get.description: Check if a specific user has already submitted a response for a specific survey (Admin/Staff only).

message.example: User has responded to this survey

post.description: Submit a new survey response using legacy format (Admin/Staff only).

answer_json.description: JSON string containing the response data

409.description: User has already responded to this survey

message.example: User has already responded to this survey
